Alias.name: Capture legal commands
Alias.script:
local cmd = matches[2] local args = matches[3]
cpc:handleCommand(cmd,args)

Script.name: CPC_Main_Script
Script.script:
cpc = cpc or {} cpc.version = "0.0.5" cpc.debug = cpc.debug or false cpc.localEcho = cpc.localEcho or true cpc.thisProfileName = getProfileName():lower()
function cpc:log(text) if cpc.debug==true then debugc("CPC:"..text) end end
function cpc:syntax(text) cecho("<orange>"..text) end
function cpc:echo(text) if cpc.localEcho==true then cecho("<cyan>"..text) print() end end
function cpc:handleCommand(cmd,args)
cpc:log("CPC: Handle command") cpc:log("cmd:'"..cmd.."'") cpc:log("args:'"..args.."'") cmd = string.lower(cmd)
if (cmd=="help") then cecho("<cyan>Scripting Coomands:\n") cecho("<cyan> #HELP \t\t\t\t this help\n") cecho("<cyan> #ALL <arguments>\t\t send command to all profiles\n") cecho("<cyan> #DO <arguments>\t\t send command to all other profiles\n") cecho("<cyan> #DO party report\t\t\t ask all other profiles to execute 'party report'\n") cecho("<cyan> #BID <name> <arguments>\t\t send command to one character (PRIORITY)\n") cecho("<cyan> #BID gandalf say hello\t\t\t ask Gandalf to say hello\n") elseif (cmd=="all") then if args ~= "" then -- Send event to all profiles, including self raiseGlobalEvent("cpc_all",args) raiseEvent("cpc_all",args) else cpc:syntax("#ALL must be called with an argument, e.g. '#ALL say hi'") end elseif (cmd=="do") then -- Only send event to other profiles, otherwise same as #ALL raiseGlobalEvent("cpc_all",args)
elseif (cmd=="bid") then raiseGlobalEvent("cpc_bid",args) raiseEvent("cpc_bid",args) end end
function cpc:onCmdAll(event,arg,profile) cpc:log("onCmdAll()") --cpc:log("Event: " .. event) cpc:log("Arg : " .. arg) -- If the event is not raised with raiseGlobalEvent() profile will be 'nil' --echo("Profile: " .. (profile or "Local") .. "\n")
cpc:echo((profile or "Local") .. " asked everyone to '" .. arg.."'") expandAlias(arg) end
function cpc:onBidEvent(event,arg,profile) local words = {} words[1], words[2] = arg:match("(%w+)(.+)") local targetProfile = words[1]:lower() local cmd = words[2] -- strip leading and trailing whitespace cmd = string.gsub(cmd, '^%s*(.-)%s*$', '%1')
--cpc:log("Tell " .. words[1] .. " to execute '" .. cmd.."'") cpc:log("Tell <" .. targetProfile .. "> to execute '" .. cmd.."'")
if profile == nil then profile = "Local" end if cpc.thisProfileName == targetProfile then cpc:echo("<cyan>" .. profile .. " bad me execute '" .. cmd .. "'") expandAlias(cmd) end end
-- CPC Event handlers cpc.allEventHandler = cpc.allEventHandler or nil cpc.bidEventHandler = cpc.bidEventHandler or nil
-- remove existing event handlers before creating new ones if cpc.allEventHandler~=nil then killAnonymousEventHandler(cpc.allEventHandler) end if cpc.bidEventHandler~=nil then killAnonymousEventHandler(cpc.bidEventHandler) end
-- setup event handlers cpc.allEventHandler = registerAnonymousEventHandler("cpc_all","cpc:onCmdAll") cpc.bidEventHandler = registerAnonymousEventHandler("cpc_bid","cpc:onBidEvent")
